titles.title: SPUR Act
Small-business Procurement Utilization Reform Act
SPUR Act
To amend the Small Business Act to increase the governmentwide goal for the percentage of procurement contracts awarded to small business concerns, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Small-business Procurement Utilization Reform Act or the SPUR Act
This bill raises from 23% to 25% the government-wide goal for participation by small businesses in procurement contracts.
